description: This file is a C source code for a test related to Pub/Sub event messaging using nanomsg and JSON. It includes handler functions for various event IDs, thread-based socket relay, and main function that initializes event producers, registers event handlers, broadcasts sample events, and cleans up.

methods.name: void suball_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles all subscription events, validates event codes and values, and exits on failure.

methods.name: void sub15_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles events with eventCode BASE_PRODUCER_ID and validates event value.

methods.name: void sub16_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles events with eventCode BASE_PRODUCER_ID + 1 and validates event value.

methods.name: void sub17_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles events with eventCode BASE_PRODUCER_ID + 2 and validates event value.

methods.name: void sub18_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles events with eventCode BASE_PRODUCER_ID + 3 and validates event value.

methods.name: void sub19_handler(int32_t eventCode,int32_t eventValue,cJSON * jsonPayload)
methods.description: Handles events with eventCode BASE_PRODUCER_ID + 4 and validates event value.

methods.name: void * pipe2pub_thread(void * args)
methods.description: Thread function that relays messages from nanomsg pull socket to pub socket.

methods.name: int pubsubTest_main(int argc,const char * argv[])
methods.description: Main test function setting up producers, subscribing to events, sending test events, and cleanup.

ctags.name: sub15_handler
ctags.pattern: /^static void sub15_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/

ctags.name: sub16_handler
ctags.pattern: /^static void sub16_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/

ctags.pattern: /^static void sub17_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/

ctags.pattern: /^static void sub18_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/

ctags.name: sub19_handler
ctags.pattern: /^static void sub19_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/

ctags.name: suball_handler
ctags.pattern: /^static void suball_handler(int32_t eventCode, int32_t eventValue, cJSON* jsonPayload)$/
